topic.title: Using FM2DITA
topic.shortdesc: FM2DITA is a FrameMaker plugin that provides numerous tools and utilities that assist in the process of converting unstructured FrameMaker files to DITA XML.

body.p: This plugin supports FrameMaker versions 7.2, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 2015, 2017, and 2019.
Documentation updated on February 4, 2019 for version 1.05.

p.i: FM2DITA will continue to be updated over time. Check for updates to get the latest tools!

body.p: FM2DITA provides the following types of automation:

li.p: Tools for analyzing existing content such as counting topics in a book, as well as generating reports of style, object, and conditional text usage
Preconversion tools for cleaning up, retagging, and renaming objects in the unstructured FM files
Breaks each FM file into multiple DITA XML topics, and generates root and chapter maps preserving the hierarchy that exists in the unstructured files
